name: 3D Mazes Game (Underline Games Studio)
description:
In this game you have to go through 3D mazes.

How to download?

1) Download the archive.

2) Unzip it.

3) Play

How to manage?

1) Use the "w" and "s" keys to control the blue and green cubes.

2) Use the "a" and "d" keys to control the red cubes.

3) Use the "r" key to reset the level.
